data.title: Problem with Doors
data.statement:
There is a school with [[N]] students and [[N]] rooms, labeled from <<1>> to [[N]]. Every room has exactly <<1 door>> and every door is {{closed}} at the start of the day.

Every morning:

The <<first student>> who enters the school flips the state of <<every door>> ({{closed}} to {{open}}, or {{open}} to {{closed}}) in the school. Being the first, they flip every door from {{closed}} to {{open}}. (Doors 1, 2, 3, etc)

The <<second student>> then flips the state of every door <<divisible by 2>>. (Doors 2, 4, 6, 8, etc)

The <<third student>> flips the state of every door <<divisible by 3>>. (Doors 3, 6, 9, etc)

The <<nth student>> flips the state of every door <<divisible by n>>.

Your goal is to find the number of {{open}} doors after all [[N]] students have entered the school.

Getting the answer will be easy, but only if you find the trick.
Best of luck.
data.stubGenerator:
read N:int
write No. of open doors
data.inputDescription: An integer [[N]], which denotes the number of <<students and doors>>
data.outputDescription: The number of open doors after everyone has entered the school

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

There is a school with N students and N rooms, labeled from 1 to N. Every room has exactly 1 door and every door is closed at the start of the day.

Every morning:

The first student who enters the school flips the state of every door (closed to open, or open to closed) in the school. Being the first, they flip every door from closed to open. (Doors 1, 2, 3, etc)

The second student then flips the state of every door divisible by 2. (Doors 2, 4, 6, 8, etc)

The third student flips the state of every door divisible by 3. (Doors 3, 6, 9, etc)

The nth student flips the state of every door divisible by n.

Your goal is to find the number of open doors after all N students have entered the school.

Getting the answer will be easy, but only if you find the trick.
Best of luck.
Input
An integer N, which denotes the number of students and doors
Output
The number of open doors after everyone has entered the school
Constraints
1 ≤ N ≤ 10000
Example
Input
1
Output
1
